LDIV(3) Library Functions Manual LDIV(3)

NAME

ldiv —
return quotient and remainder from division

LIBRARY

Standard C Library (libc, -lc)

SYNOPSIS

#include <stdlib.h>

ldiv_t
ldiv(long numer, long denom);

DESCRIPTION

The ldiv() function computes the value numer/denom (numerator/denominator). Ir returns the quotient and remainder in a structure named ldiv_t that contains two long members named quot and rem.

SEE ALSO

div(3), imaxdiv(3), lldiv(3), math(3)

STANDARDS

The ldiv() function conforms to ISO/IEC 9899:1999 (“ISO C99”).
November 14, 2001 Mac OS X 10.15
